snippet: The Marine Corps said Wednesday it would investigate a video showing what appears to be American forces in Afghanistan urinating on the corpses of Taliban fighters.
abstract: Marine Corps says it will investigate a video showing what appears to be American forces in Afghanistan urinating on the corpses of Taliban fighters.
lead_paragraph: The Marine Corps said Wednesday it would investigate a video showing what appears to be American forces in Afghanistan urinating on the corpses of Taliban fighters.
